Today we'll revisit the MA data from Module 0. We'll also introduce data on the MA quality rating program and how it plays out in real life.

## Objectives

- Understand the MA data and datasets required for this Module
- Explain the MA star rating program and how the star ratings are calculated
- Explain the MA quality improvement program


## Activities 

- Clone the [Medicare Advantage](https://github.com/imccart/ma-class) repository (if you haven't already) and begin working with data.
